name: SMS Manager
title: Send SMS messages
description: Send SMS messages via Heroku SMS Manager service

inputs.name: recipient
inputs.title: Recipient Phone Number
inputs.description: The phone number of the recipient, including country code (e.g. +1 for US)

inputs.name: message
inputs.title: Message
inputs.description: The message to be sent via SMS

outputs.name: status
outputs.title: Status
outputs.description: Status of the SMS message, either 'sent' or 'failed'
